pageTitle: Shreenath Paper IPO Date, Price, GMP, Review, Details
pageHeading: Shreenath Paper Products Limited IPO (Shreenath Paper IPO) Detail

lotSize.summary: Investors can bid for a minimum of 3000 shares and in multiples thereof. The following table depicts the minimum and maximum investment by Retail Investors and HNI in terms of shares and amount.

promoterHolding.promoters: Alok Parekh Ronak Parekh Navneetdas Parekh Hasumati Navneetdas Parekh Harish Parekh Hasumati Harish Parekh Neha Parekh and Sayali Parekh are the promoters of the company.
promoterHolding.note: The value will be calculated using Equity Dilution = Share Holding Pre Issue - Share Holding Post Issue

about.details:
Incorporated in 2011, Shreenath Paper Products Limited is engaged in offering supply chain solutions to industries that use paper materials such as coated, food-grade, machine-glazed, and adhesive papers in their manufacturing processes.

The company supplies various papers, including sublimation base paper, thermal base paper, straw paper, cup stock paper, security PSA sheets, high-strength paper, C2S and C1S papers, and more.

The company understands client needs, defines specifications, sources specialized manufacturers, tests samples, procures materials in desired quantities, and supplies paper in various grades made from recycled paper, bagasse, and virgin pulp.

The company supplies paper products used in industries such as FMCG, textiles, pharmaceuticals, packaging, food & beverages, e-commerce, and more, primarily in Maharashtra, Gujarat, and Madhya Pradesh.

Product Portfolio:

Sublimation Base Paper, Thermal Base Paper, Straw Paper, Cone Sleeve, Cup Stock, ARSR etc.

  • Coated Paper and Board: The company supplies coated paper used for printing annual reports, brochures, magazines, and posters, as well as for manufacturing labels, stickers, and sachets, offering improved print quality and durability.
  • Coating Base: The company supplies sublimation, thermal, and NCR base papers for various applications, including textile printing, thermal printing, and carbonless copy paper, ensuring high-quality prints and efficient processes for diverse industries.
  • Speciality Paper: The company supplies specialty papers such as parchment, ledger, rail bond, cup stock, MG poster, carry bag, and natural shade paper, each serving unique purposes in industries like baking, transportation, and packaging.
  • Cream wove paper: The company supplies premium cream wove papers like Optima, Kappa-G, and Fine Print, offering smooth textures and high printability for brochures, invitations, packaging, and luxury promotional materials across various industries.

As of December 31, 2024, the company had 9 employees.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Extensible Business Model
  • Strong Network of supplier
  • Multiproduct Portfolio and ability to identify customer requirements
  • Strong relationships with key customers
  • Experienced management team with an established track record
  • Track record of financial performance

contactDetails.full_address: Shreenath Paper Products Limited, Shop no. 5 Plot no.136 N-1, Masco Corner API Road, Cidco

faqs.question: What is the Shreenath Paper IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shreenath Paper IPO is a SME IPO of 5310000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹23.36 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹44 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on February 25, 2025, and closes on February 28, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shreenath Paper IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shreenath Paper IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shreenath Paper IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shreenath Paper IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shreenath Paper IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shreenath Paper IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shreenath Paper IPO opens on February 25, 2025 and closes on February 28, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shreenath Paper IPO?
faqs.answer: Shreenath Paper IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shreenath Paper IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shreenath Paper IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Shreenath Paper IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Shreenath Paper IPO will be done on Monday, March 3, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, March 4, 2025. Check the Shreenath Paper IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Shreenath Paper IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Shreenath Paper IPO listing date is on Wednesday, March 5, 2025.

reservation.summary: Shreenath Paper IPO offers total 5310000 shares. Out of which 2514000 (47.34%) allocated to NII 2514000 (47.34%) allocated to RII.
